name: ignite-fitness
description: AI-powered fitness coaching Progressive Web App

scripts.perf:check: npm run build && npm run perf:budget
scripts.test:smoke: playwright test tests/smoke.spec.js || echo 'Playwright not configured, skipping smoke tests'
scripts.test:dom: node tools/check-dom-safety.js || echo 'DOM safety check skipped'
scripts.test:health: node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200); res.end('OK'); }).listen(8001, () => console.log('Health check server running on :8001'));"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:imports && npm run test:syntax && npm run test:dom && npm run test:smoke
scripts.lint: npm run test:syntax && npm run test:imports && npm run test:dom
scripts.serve: npx http-server . -p 3000 -c-1 || python3 -m http.server 3000 || echo 'No server available, install http-server or use Python'
